details.title: Pixelate Sr.
details.description: A DSLR photography contest among teams of single individuals, two teams from each school. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic.      [Eligibility: XI-XII]

details.title: Pixelate Jr.
details.description: A DSLR photography contest among teams of single individuals, two teams from each school. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic. [Eligibility: IX-X]

details.title: Phonescape Sr.
details.description: A phone photography contest. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic.  [Eligibility: XI-XII]

details.title: Phonescape Jr.
details.description: A phone photography contest. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic. [Eligibility: IX-X]

details.title: Camistic
details.description: A storyboard where participants create a story using pictures and provide a suitable title to it. [Eligibility: IX-XII]

details.title: Hi-Res
details.description: Create a film with a title and message, under 4-6 minutes that is creative and relevant to the topic.  [Eligibility: Open]

details.title: CreADive
details.description: An Ad-making competition where participants would shoot and edit an advertisement.The time limit is 45-75 seconds. [Eligibility: Open]

details.title: Rendered
details.description: Snap a picture and create a disguise, for it to appear a certain way that is creative, original and relevant to the theme provided on the spot. [Eligibility: IX-XII]

details.title: Surprise Event
details.description: The surprise event can be any one of the categories: Photography, Film making, Creative design, Sound design or Video editing. Might even be a blend of a few, it is for us to know, and for you to overcome! [Eligibility: IX-XII]
